title: Part One: The Rise And Fall (And Rise) of Arch-Grifter Jim Bakker
itunes:title: Part One: The Rise And Fall (And Rise) of Arch-Grifter Jim Bakker
description:
Robert is joined by Vic Berger to discuss Televangelist, Jim Bakker.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. PTL: The Rise and Fall of Jim and Tammy Faye Bakker's Evangelical Empire
  2. Touching Empathy
  3. The “Real” Reason Televangelist Jim Bakker Went to Jail
  4. What happened to Tammy Faye Bakker after the PTL scandal?
  5. Jim Bakker is Still Here
  6. The Second Coming Of Televangelist Jim Bakker
  7. Where Are They Now?: Jim Bakker
  8. Jim Bakker's Christian amusement park is now a post-apocalyptic ghost town
  9. Jim Bakker Freed From Jail To Stay in a Halfway House
  10. 1987: Jim Bakker resigns from PTL; Jerry Falwell assumes leadership
  11. Interview with Jessica Hahn
  12. About Pastor Jim
  13. The scandals that brought down the Bakkers, once among US's most famous televangelists
  14. Televangelist Jim Bakker’s Road to Redemption
  15. Apocalypse Chow: We Tried Televangelist Jim Bakker's 'Survival Food'
